name: The Horde Needs More Runecloth Bandages!
tooltip:
The Horde Needs More Runecloth Bandages!

Ever does the time grow nearer when we shall launch ourselves headlong into the conflagration at Ahn'Qiraj, <class>. But first we must gather our strength and prepare so that we can survive the onslaught of the insects and their masters.

If you are here again, then surely you wish to make another contribution of runecloth bandages to the war effort? Please do so as soon as you can and return to me once more.

Requirements:
- Runecloth Bandage x 20
